add-a-song: Na seznam multimedijske vsebine dodaj pesem iz naše pesmarice.
add-a-video-explain: Na seznam multimedijske vsebine dodaj enega od videoposnetkov z jw.org. Tu so sicer prikazani samo najnovejši videoposnetki, vendar lahko po potrebi poiščeš tudi katerega koli drugega.
advancedDescription: Izkušeni uporabniki bodo morda želeli nekoliko spremeniti te nastavitve, vendar je privzeta nastavitev običajno dovolj dobra.
also-look-for-this-button-in-m-s-footer: Prav tako poišči ta gumb na spodnjem robu programa M³:
app-description: Meeting Media Manager je aplikacija, ki deluje na različnih platformah in se uporablja za prikazovanje multimedijske vsebine na občinskih shodih Jehovovih prič. Povezana je s programom OBS Studio, ki omogoča prikazovanje multimedijske vsebine v kraljestveni dvorani in na Zoomu. Aplikacija M³ s svojo obsežno funkcionalnostjo in intuitivnim vmesnikom olajša delo služabnikov za avdio-video. Podpira vse teokratične formate datotek pa tudi datoteke PDF in običajne multimedijske datoteke. Glede na potrebe vaše občine lahko dopolnjuje ali celo nadomesti program JW Library.
app-issues: Če imate težave ali ste odkrili kako napako, pojdite na našo spletno stran GitHub in ustvarite novo težavo (Issue) ali pa nas kontaktirajte prek GitHub Discussions in podrobno opišite težavo. Odgovorili vam bomo v najkrajšem možnem času.
applicationConfigurationDescription: Prilagodi obnašanje in videz te aplikacije
are-you-sure-delete: Ali si prepričan, da želiš izbrisati datoteko "{mediaToDelete}"?
are-you-sure-delete-cache: Ali si prepričan, da želiš izbrisati vse datoteke v predpomnilniku?
are-you-sure-delete-unused-cache: Ali si prepričan, da želiš izbrisati neuporabljene datoteke iz predpomnilnika?
are-you-sure-you-want-to-clear-the-cache: Ali si prepričan, da želiš počistiti predpomnilnik?
are-you-sure-you-want-to-delete: Ali si prepričan, da želiš to izbrisati
are-you-sure-you-want-to-delete-this-pro: Ali si prepričan, da želiš izbrisati profil {profileName}?
autoStartAtLogin: Samodejno zaženi M³ ob zagonu računalnika
autoStartAtLogin-explain: M³ se lahko samodejno zažene ob zagonu računalnika.
autoStartMusic: Samodejno zaženi glasbo v ozadju pred shodi
autoStartMusic-explain: Če se bo shod začel nekaj minut ali ur po zagonu programa M³, se bo glasba v ozadju začela predvajati samodejno.
choose-a-document-for-import: Izberi dokument, ki vsebuje mutimedijsko vsebino.
clicking-it-will-allow-you-to-start-and-: S klikom na ta gumb lahko zaženeš ali ustaviš predvajanje glasbe v ozadju. Če je program M³ aktiven, se bo glasba pred shodom začela samodejno predvajati in se bo tudi samodejno ustavila tik pred začetkom shoda. Po zaključni molitvi pa je treba predvajanje glasbe v ozadju zagnati ročno s klikom na ta gumb.
clicking-it-will-allow-you-to-temporaril: S klikom na ta gumb lahko začasno skriješ multimedijo in letni stavek, s čimer se bodo pokazali udeleženci na Zoomu, ki so drugače skriti spodaj. Ko je točke na Zoomu konec, lahko s klikom na isti gumb ponovno prikažeš besedilo letnega stavka.
configure-a-scene-in-obs-studio-to-captu: V programu OBS Studio nastavi prizor za zajem multimedijskega okna.
configure-a-scene-in-obs-studio-to-show-: V programu OBS Studio nastavi prizor za prikaz širokega posnetka odra.
configure-the-websocket-plugin-in-obs-st: V programu OBS Studio je treba nastaviti vtičnik Websocket. Potreben je tudi vtičnik Virtual Camera, zato je treba tudi tega namestiti in nastaviti.
congregationMeetingsDescription: Nastavitve, ki se nanašajo na vašo občino in razpored shodov
congregationName-explain: To ime bo v aplikaciji prikazano v meniju za izbiro profila.
coWeek-explain: Če ta datum vpisan, bo M³ shod sredi tedna samodejno prestavil na torek v tem tednu. Prav tako bo preskočil multimedijsko vsebino za Občinsko preučevanje Bibije ter sklepne pesmi za shod med tednom in ob koncu tedna.
currently-loading: Trenutno se nalaga multimedijska vsebina za današnji dan.
darkMode-explain: Prisili aplikacijo, da uporabi svetli ali temni način, ali pa uporabi privzeto nastavitev sistema
disableMediaFetching: Use M³ as a JW Library companion
disableMediaFetching-explain: Enabling this will disable automatic media fetching in M³. In that case, JW Library can be used to display normal meeting media, and M³ can be used to display other manually added media. M³ has many practical features such as importing of PDF documents and zooming and panning of images. Please note that this toggle should be disabled in almost all cases.
does-your-kingdom-hall-use-a-program-cal: Does your Kingdom Hall use a program called OBS Studio?
doing-so-will-greatly-simplify-and-facil: Doing so will greatly simplify and facilitate sharing media during hybrid meetings.
drag-and-drop-or: Drag and drop files here or
enableExtraCache-explain: Cache all songbook videos to improve performance. Note that this will increase the size of the media cache.
enableKeyboardShortcuts-explain: Use keyboard shortcuts to streamline media presentation.
enableMediaDisplayButton-explain: Display images and videos in a window or on an external screen. If using at a Kingdom Hall, this should in most cases be enabled.
enableMusicButton-explain: Play songs before and after the meetings with only a few clicks.
enableSubtitles-explain: Enable subtitles by default for all videos.
enter-a-key-combination-now-using-your-k: Enter a key combination now using your keyboard.
enter-the-port-and-password-configured-i: Enter the port and password configured in OBS Studio's Websocket plugin.
error.downloadMedia: An error occurred while downloading media. Please try again later.
excludeFootnotes: Ne vključi multimedije iz podčrtnih opomb v preučevalni izdaji Stražnega stolpa
excludeFootnotes-explain: Do not include videos or other media from footnotes in Watchtower articles.
excludeTh: Exclude all media from the Teaching brochure
excludeTh-explain: Do not include videos or other media from the Teaching brochure.
feel-free-to-browse-around-the-other-ava: Feel free to browse around the other available options, or if you prefer you can head right to the media playback screen and start using it to display media.
file-not-available: The file is not available at this time. Please try again later, or import the file if you have it on your device.
fileProcessError: There was an error processing this file
filetypeNotSupported: This file type is not yet supported
hideMediaLogo: Skrij logotip JW v oknu za predvajanje multimedijske vsebine
hideMediaLogo-explain: S tem odstraniš kvadratni logotip JW iz spodnjega desnega kota. Če aplikacijo uporabljate v kraljestveni dvorani, je treba logotip v večini primerov onemogočiti.
images-videos-explain: Slike, videoposnetki, zvočne datoteke, dokumenti PDF in druge multimedijske datoteke
in-what-language-should-media-be-downloa: V katerem jeziku je treba prenesti multimedijsko vsebino?
includePrinted: Vključi tiskane medije, če so na voljo.
includePrinted-explain: Prikaži dodatne slike iz tiskanih publikacij, ki morda niso vključene v digitalne publikacije.
integrationsDescription: Nastavi združevanje z drugimi aplikacijami in storitvami
is-obs-studio-configured-correctly: Ali je OBS Studio pravilno nastavljen?
jw-playlist-explain: Datoteka s seznamom predvajanja, izvožena iz JW Library
jwpub-file-explain: Publikacija, prenesena s spletne strani jw.org
jwpubNoMultimedia: Datoteka JWPUB ne vsebuje multimedijskih vsebin
lang-explain: Izberi jezik, v katerem potekajo shodi. To je jezik, ki se bo uporabljal za prenos in predvajanje multimedijske vsebine.
langFallback-explain: Če multimedijska vsebina pogosto ni na voljo v glavnem jeziku občine, lahko tukaj izbereš sekundarni jezik.
langSubtitles-explain: To je jezik, v katerem bodo preneseni in predvajani podnapisi.
local-media-explain-1: Če iz računalnika uvoziš slike, videoposnetke, zvočne datoteke, sezname predvajanja JW Library, datoteke JWPUB ali dokumente PDF, bodo prikazani na seznamu multimedijske vsebine.
local-media-explain-2: Za ogled celotnega seznama podprtih formatov klikni sem.
localAppLang-explain: To je jezik, v katerem bo prikazan M³. To ne vpliva na jezik, v katerem je prenesena multimedijska vsebina.
look-for-this-button-in-m-s-footer: Ta gumb poišči na spodnjem robu M³:
m-is-now-ready-to-be-used: M³ je zdaj pripravljen za uporabo.
maxRes-explain: Izberi največjo ločljivost za videoposnetke. Videoposnetki nad to ločljivostjo ne bodo preneseni.
mediaRetrievalAndPlaybackDescription: Configure meeting media download and playback settings.
musicVolume-explain: Choose the volume of the background music playback. This allows to set a lower volume for background music, while keeping the volume of other media high.
mwDay-explain: Choose the day on which the midweek meeting takes place.
mwStartTime-explain: Choose the time at which the midweek meeting starts.
no-key-combination: Enter a key combination now using your keyboard.
noDownloadsInProgress: No downloads are currently in progress
noMedia: There are no media items for the selected date. Use the Import media menu to add some.
notice-the-yeartext-is-now-being-display: You'll notice the yeartext is now being displayed on the external monitor! But let's keep going.
obs-studio-is-a-free-app-used-to-manage-: OBS Studio is a free app used to manage camera and video feeds in many Kingdom Halls.
obsCameraScene: Privzeta scena s pogledom na oder v programu OBS Studio
obsCameraScene-explain: The scene in OBS Studio that will be used as the default stage view. As per latest direction, this should be a wide shot.
obsEnable-explain: Connect M³ to OBS Studio to enable automated switching between media and camera scenes.
obsImageScene: Scene to display images in OBS Studio [optional]
obsImageScene-explain: A scene can be configured in OBS Studio specifically to display images, for example in a picture-in-picture style. If this is left blank, the default media scene will be used instead.
obsMediaScene: Prizor medijskega okna v programu OBS Studio
obsMediaScene-explain: The scene in OBS Studio that will be used to broadcast media to Zoom participants.
obsPassword-explain: Find the configured password under Tools > WebSocket Server Settings in OBS Studio.
obsPort-explain: Find the configured port under Tools > WebSocket Server Settings in OBS Studio.
once-the-scene-has-been-created-select-i: Once the scene has been created, select it here.
only-show-settings-that-are-not-valid: Only show settings that are not valid
pdfFilesNotSupported: PDF files are not supported yet
please-use-image-or-jwpub: Please select an image file or a JWPUB file that contains an image
please-wait-downloading-media-for-this-d: Prosim, počakaj, prenaša se multimedijska vsebina za danes ...
select-a-custom-background: Choose an image that will be displayed as the background image instead of the yeartext. This would normally be used only one special occasions, such as the Memorial.
select-a-date-to-begin: Please select a date to begin.
select-s34mp-to-add-public-talk-media: Select an S-34mp JWPUB file downloaded from jw.org to quickly access the Public Talk Media Playlist. The file will be cached and can be updated by browsing to an updated version at any time.
selected-jwpub-no-media: The selected JWPUB file does not contain any media.
setupWizard.intro: M³ is an app designed to make your playing media at congregation meetings easy and stress-free. Let's configure a few things, and then we'll get on our way.
shortcutMediaWindow-explain: Shortcut to quickly hide or show the media window.
shortcutMusic-explain: Shortcut to start or stop the background music.
speaker: Speaker
successfully-migrated-from-the-previous-: Successfully migrated from the previous version
sureStopVideo: Are you sure you want to stop the video?
the-name-of-your-congregation-or-group-w: The name of your congregation or group will be used to quickly switch between profiles, if ever you decide create more than one in the future.
there-are-no-media-items-for-the-selecte: There are no media items for the selected date.
this-will-speed-up-media-retrieval-for-m: This will speed up media retrieval for meeting media, but is not mandatory.
to-add-files-from-your-computer-drag-and: To add files from your computer, drag-and-drop them directly into this window.
to-quickly-show-and-hide-zoom-participan: Tip: To ensure you're able to quickly show and hide Zoom participants on the TV screens when needed, make sure that the setting to "use dual monitors" in Zoom is enabled.
tryConfiguringFallbackLanguage: Try configuring a fallback language in the settings
use-the-import-button-to-add-media-for-t: Use the Import button to add media for this date or select another date to view the corresponding meeting media.
use-the-slider-below-to-adjust-the-start: Use the slider below to adjust the start and end time of this media item. This is useful for playing only certain parts of a video.
weDay-explain: Choose the day on which the midweek meeting takes place.
well-start-fetching-media-while-we-wrap-: We'll start fetching media while we wrap up with our initial setup.
weStartTime-explain: Choose the time at which the weekend meeting starts.
what-are-your-meeting-days-and-times-wel: What are your meeting days and times? We'll use this info to display the media calendar.
what-language-would-you-like-m-to-be-dis: What language would you like M³ to be displayed in?
when-you-are-done-presenting-the-website: When you are done presenting the website, you can either close the website window, or click again on the button in the top right corner of this window.
when-you-click-the-button-on-the-top-rig: When you click the button on the top right corner of this window, a new window will open where the website will be presented. What you see in this window will be mirrored into the media window.
would-you-like-to-enable-songbook-video-: Would you like to cache all songbook videos?
would-you-like-to-integrate-m-with-obs-s: Would you like to integrate M³ with OBS Studio?
you-can-also-use-the-button-below-to-bro: You can also browse for files manually if you prefer.
